verses.verse: He that dasheth in <S%H6327>pieces<s%> is come <S%H5927>up<s%> before thy <S%H6440>face<s%>: <S%H5341>keep<s%> the <S%H4694>munition<s%>, <S%H6822>watch<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%>, make thy <S%H4975>loins<s%> <S%H2388>strong<s%>, <S%H553>fortify<s%> thy <S%H3581>power<s%> <S%H3966>mightily<s%>.

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath turned <S%H7725>away<s%> the <S%H1347>excellency<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, as the <S%H1347>excellency<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: for the <S%H1238>emptiers<s%> have emptied them <S%H1238>out<s%>, and <S%H7843>marred<s%> their vine <S%H2156>branches<s%>.

The <S%H4043>shield<s%> of his mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> is made <S%H119>red<s%>, the <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> are in <S%H8529>scarlet<s%>: the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> shall be with <S%H784>flaming<s%> <S%H6393>torches<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H3559>preparation<s%>, and the fir <S%H1265>trees<s%> shall be terribly <S%H7477>shaken<s%>.

The <S%H7393>chariots<s%> shall <S%H1984>rage<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets<s%>, they shall justle one against <S%H8264>another<s%> in the broad <S%H7339>ways<s%>: they shall <S%H4758>seem<s%> like <S%H3940>torches<s%>, they shall <S%H7323>run<s%> like the <S%H1300>lightnings<s%>.

He shall <S%H2142>recount<s%> his <S%H117>worthies<s%>: they shall <S%H3782>stumble<s%> in their <S%H1979>walk<s%>; they shall make <S%H4116>haste<s%> to the <S%H2346>wall<s%> thereof, and the <S%H5526>defence<s%> shall be <S%H3559>prepared<s%>.
The <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> shall be <S%H6605>opened<s%>, and the <S%H1964>palace<s%> shall be <S%H4127>dissolved<s%>.

And <S%H5324>Huzzab<s%> shall be led away <S%H1540>captive<s%>, she shall be brought <S%H5927>up<s%>, and her <S%H519>maids<s%> shall <S%H5090>lead<s%> her as with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3123>doves<s%>, <S%H8608>tabering<s%> upon their <S%H3824>breasts<s%>.

But <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> is of <S%H3117>old<s%> like a <S%H1295>pool<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>: yet they shall flee <S%H5127>away<s%>. <S%H5975>Stand<s%>, <S%H5975>stand<s%>, shall they cry; but none shall look <S%H6437>back<s%>.

Take ye the <S%H962>spoil<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, take the <S%H962>spoil<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>: for there is none <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H8498>store<s%> and <S%H3519>glory<s%> out of all the <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H3627>furniture<s%>.

She is <S%H950>empty<s%>, and <S%H4003>void<s%>, and <S%H1110>waste<s%>: and the <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H4549>melteth<s%>, and the <S%H1290>knees<s%> smite <S%H6375>together<s%>, and much <S%H2479>pain<s%> is in all <S%H4975>loins<s%>, and the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of them all <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H6289>blackness<s%>.

Where is the <S%H4583>dwelling<s%> of the <S%H738>lions<s%>, and the <S%H4829>feedingplace<s%> of the young <S%H3715>lions<s%>, where the <S%H738>lion<s%>, even the old <S%H3833>lion<s%>, <S%H1980>walked<s%>, and the <S%H738>lion's<s%> <S%H1482>whelp<s%>, and none made them <S%H2729>afraid<s%>?

The <S%H738>lion<s%> did tear in <S%H2963>pieces<s%> <S%H1767>enough<s%> for his <S%H1484>whelps<s%>, and <S%H2614>strangled<s%> for his <S%H3833>lionesses<s%>, and <S%H4390>filled<s%> his <S%H2356>holes<s%> with <S%H2964>prey<s%>, and his <S%H4585>dens<s%> with <S%H2966>ravin<s%>.

Behold, I am against thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, and I will <S%H1197>burn<s%> her <S%H7393>chariots<s%> in the <S%H6227>smoke<s%>, and the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> thy young <S%H3715>lions<s%>: and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> thy <S%H2964>prey<s%> from the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of thy <S%H4397>messengers<s%> shall no more be <S%H8085>heard<s%>.
